medical_history.chief_complaint: Intensely itchy and coalescing papules and plaques on the labia majora.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The vulvar skin condition started 2 months before consultation, initially presenting as dark spots in the labia majora. One month before the consultation, the spots became thickened plaques and increased itching, prompting consultation with a physician. Two weeks before consultation, coalescing papules and plaques began to appear. The itching worsened with anger or anxiety.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hormonal contraceptive use, frequent wearing of tight clothing, and smoking. Personal and familial history of allergic rhinitis from her mother.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had a personal and familial history of allergic rhinitis.
medical_history.social_history: The patient has a history of smoking and wearing tight clothing.
